cloudrtree

Class CloudRTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • cloudrtree.CloudRTree

  • public class CloudRTree
extends java.lang.Object
    R-Tree with configurable split algorithms and configurable storage implementations
    Author:
    David Sergio
